pages.name: Amphithere
pages.text: $(thing)Amphitheres$()$(#734608) are colorful winged serpents with many feathers adorning its wings and tail

$(#734608)Unlike other beasts, amphitheres are docile and will not attack unless provoked. They have even been seen to protect nearby villagers.$(br2)When they do attack however, they will do moderate damage with their bites and will knock targets back with their tail.$(br2)Amphitheres can be found flying through jungle biomes.

$(#734608)Hitting the amphithere with any projectile will be able to disrupt its glide and bring it to the ground to be killed or tamed.$(br2)Killing it will drop their feathers and rarely a skull$(br2)$(item)Amphithere feathers$()$(#734608) are used to craft an $(item)amphithere macuahuitl$()$(#734608) or $(item)amphithere arrows$()$(#734608), both of which have incredible knockback$(br2)The macuahuitl is also capable of disabling shields

$(#734608)Taming an amphithere requires enduring its relentless bite attacks long enough while mounting it.$(br2)As a tamed beast, the amphithere serves as an incredibly fast aerial mount and fairly competent combat assistance$(br2)Two amphitheres can also be bred with cookies

$(#734608)Its behavior can be altered by interacting with it while sneaking$(br2)They can be summoned from the air with a $(item)dragon bone flute$()$(#734608)$(br2)Additionally, using a $(item)dragon command staff$()$(#734608) will set its current home position
